test_results.comments: PDW is a measure of platelet anisocytosis & plateletcrit and is indicative of the volume of circulating platelets in a unit volume of blood.

interpretation.<9.0: Lower than normal range; may indicate iron or B12 deficiency, bone marrow disorders
interpretation.9.0-17.0: Normal range; indicates a normal variation in the size of platelets in the blood
interpretation.> 17.0: Higher than normal range; may indicate liver disease, bone marrow disorders, or immune thrombocytopenia
